long_description: Designed for adventures in the sun and shade, the Tifosi Tyrant 2.0 photochromic sunglasses auto-adjust their tint so you can keep going without stopping to swap lenses or sunglasses. Fototec(TM) photochromic lenses automatically adjust tint according to level of light; lenses darken in bright light and lighten when there's less light. Gunmetal frames feature Light Night Fototec lenses that excel in a wide range of light conditions without distorting colors. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Ventilated lenses increase airflow to help eliminate fogging. Light Grilamid(R) TR90 nylon frames offer an optimized fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant; adjustable arms let you customize the fit. Adjustable, hydrophilic rubber nosepieces and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Fits small to medium faces. Tifosi Tyrant 2.0 photochromic sunglasses include a semirigid zippered storage case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: Designed for adventures in the sun and shade, the Tifosi Tyrant 2.0 photochromic sunglasses auto-adjust their tint so you can keep going without stopping to swap lenses or sunglasses.
